title: Spanish Jhinquisition
body:
I pretty much sold the concept in the title, but alas I will attempt to make riot embrace this skin of legends. staying objective we already have a "inquisition" series with Kayle Singed and Nocturne, so I feel this would fit perfectly. in character he would seem like the kind of man to announce "NO ONE EXPECT THE SPANISH JHINQUISTION" I picture a red robe, his E a pyre for the heretics that blasts into an inferno, and finally a grand orchestral choir resonating with bullets of sacrilege the bishop of blood is about to impose. to me it seems worthy of our greatest performer on the rift, one to bring terror to that of the non believers!
{{champion:202}}  "Art requires a certain... cruelty"

replies.body: Side note, he could scream the four chief weapons of the Jhinquisition: Fear, surprise, ruthless efficiency, an almost fanatical devotion to the Pope, and nice red uniforms - oh wait..
I think that in general we should have more skins that make reference to monty python

> [{quoted}](name=pasta zugotini,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AbsIavr6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-09T00:55:22.970+0000)
>
> I think that in general we should have more skins that make reference to monty python

how about sir garencelot and queen katarviere.
AND THE YORDLES THAT SAY NE!
with {{champion:115}}  throwing the holy grenade as an ult!!!

> [{quoted}](name=pasta zugotini,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AbsIavr6,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-13T17:23:37.218+0000)
>
> with {{champion:115}}  throwing the holy grenade as an ult!!!

yes yes yes yes ye- (suddenly) NOBODY EXPECTS THE SPANISH JHINQUISITION!
and teemo the killer rabbit
EDIT: i forgot, make a spanish inquisition skin for kayle
"Our four chief elements are: range, damage, ruthless critting, and an an almost fanatical devotion to art... and nice red paint! Damn!"

Additionally he would apppreciate being member number  
#4!
Then would his bouncing grenade be the soft cushions with all the stuffing at one end?
Wait does that mean that his E should be... THE RACK? I think there are limits to how far riot would go with the references ^^

As a Jhin main, this be a worthy outfit for such an opera.
Ye have me condolences. 

http://i.imgur.com/2TeBXJq.gif

{{champion:202}}_Now let's make this stage a little more... **Red,** shall we?_ 
https://49.media.tumblr.com/0cb72e592f1162c21e44bd1edc1a65b3/tumblr_o54w73hc7w1qjnbtgo3_400.gif
Project: Jhin would be better in my  opinion. It's just screaming for it to be made.
Except that it would be too similar to High Noon, thematically.
